scenario_1.calculation_notes: Base fee for 1040 is $175. Time charge is 2.5 hours * $125/hr * 1.15 complexity multiplier (first-time client) - $175 = $131.25. Additional forms are Schedule A ($50) and Schedule B ($35). Total fee is the sum of all components.

scenario_2.calculation_notes: Base fee for 1120S is $650. Time charge is 4 hours * $125/hr * 1.25 complexity multiplier (prior year amendments) - $650 = $375. Additional forms are 3 Schedule K-1s ($225) and Form 4562 ($85). Complexity adjustment is $650 * 1.25 - $650 = $256.25.

scenario_3.calculation_notes: Base fee for 1040 is $175. Time charge is 3 hours * $125/hr * 1.4 complexity multiplier (2 state returns) - $175 = $195. Additional forms are Schedule C ($125), Schedule SE ($40), and Form 8829 ($45). Complexity adjustment is $175 * 1.4 - $175 = $70.

scenario_4.calculation_notes: Base fee for 1065 is $550. Time charge is 5.5 hours * $125/hr * 1.35 complexity multiplier (complex asset dispositions) - $550 = $618.75. Additional forms are 5 Schedule K-1s ($375) and Form 4797 ($95). Complexity adjustment is $550 * 1.35 - $550 = $192.50.

scenario_5.calculation_notes: Base fee for 1040 is $175. Time charge is 3.5 hours * $125/hr * 1.3 complexity multiplier (foreign income) - $175 = $306.25. Additional forms are Schedule D ($75) and Schedule E for 3 properties ($300). Complexity adjustment is $175 * 1.3 - $175 = $52.50.
